name: Sachs & Co
overview: The company has a responsibility to the clients, shareholders, employees and communities to support and fund ideas and facilitate growth. They do so by investing in people, businesses and communities around the world. In a service business, they know that without dedicated, talented and thoughtful people, they cannot be the firm aspire to be. The principal assets are people, capital and reputation. They are committed to maintaining a culture of diversity, integrity and strong business principles. Financial institutions have an obligation to the broader financial system. The industry has much to do to regain the publicâ€™s trust and to help mend the financial system. They are working to restore stability and soundness, and to address the underlying causes of the global financial crisis so that growth can resume. At Goldman Sachs they recognize the importance of providing timely, relevant information about the firm to the media and the general public. This section of the site provides both current and archived news items about them.
